channel.title: Pi
channel.description: Hey guys, in my fight pits, I was having trouble making it say "Attack" after I added in the player shops, I finally made it say "Attack" whenever you right click them in the fight pits, but whenever you click attack, it opens their shop, can someone help me or give me a correct way to make them attack you whenever you press attack?

item.title: Pi
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys, in my fight pits, I was having trouble making it say “Attack” after I added in the player shops, I finally made it say “Attack” whenever you right click them in the fight pits, but whenever you click attack, it opens their shop, can someone help me or give me a correct way to make them attack you whenever you press attack?

Read full topic
